extendedInfo.description: This APP is a compliment to the FanStar Fantasy League Manager website. It is a mobile interface that allows team owners access to all the features of the service. Features include: â¢ Do add, drops, waiver wire, trades, lineups, bids and more â¢ View live league results â¢ View league reports â¢ Supports Live Drafts and much more.Android is such a diverse OS with many hardware configurations.  Please, if you any questions with functionality of app, email us at fanstar@gmail.com.   We will make sure it works for you or refund your money

reviews.title: Aweful!
reviews.comment: They should refund everyones money for this one! Sucks when the app will not launch repeatedly and you spend all your time just trying to get a score, and not actually watching games!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: only works on WIFI
reviews.comment: Mine only works on WIFI. When I try to use it with Cell service I get an error message. They say that there is an update coming to fix it, hopefully soon football season is a few days away. i will give them a few more days, then i want my money back. If they get it out before the season I will change my rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Doesnt even open now, just hours after purchase and too late for refund. Really bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: Once I figured out to put both my leagues in, it works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Robbery
reviews.comment: I find it crazy that you would charge to make a league. And then charge for an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works flawless for all 3 of my leagues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Connection
reviews.comment: Constant problems with the app connecting and running
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t believe its a paid app only..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Does not work and very little support from fan star. Don\'t waste your own time and money. Should get zero stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fanstar football!
reviews.comment: Great app. Very easy to use. Can do everything u need!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Job
reviews.comment: So far works great.  Well worth paying for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What Happened
reviews.comment: I don\'t what\'s going on but it doesn\'t want to load all of a sudden. Not cool when we pay for the site .ow paying for the app too. Wouldn\'t mind paying if it would just load
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: It worked for about 2 weeks on & off. Now it\'s been 2 weeks no updates. I emailed the vendor & the advice was \"use the web browser\" You can do that for free so no point to buy this POS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: The app has worked perfect for me and they helped me out with all my problems I had. Great app and service
reviews.author: A Google User
